title: Egyptian Cake
content:
Fancy a cake from Pharoh's time? Check out the Egyptian cake that a customer ordered. Most of our cakes are one off designs so you get it the way you described it to our pastry chef. 

![Egyptian Cake](/images/uploads/egyptiancake.jpg "Egyptian Cake")

Can you imagine a more fanciful cake? Then contact us and talk to us. Who knows? Perhaps yours might be the next fanciful cake we share with our clients.
